rules_text:
Flying, Crew 1. Crew only once each turn.
Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token, then you may sacrifice this Vehicle. If you do, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the total power of creatures that crewed this Vehicle this turn. You may play those cards this turn.
